revised_title: The Glio-Vascular System and Lymphoid Channels in Cephalopods
tldr: The glio-vascular system and lymphoid channels in cephalopods play a crucial role in nourishing and supporting nerve cells. The study reveals an elaborate system of tissue spaces throughout the neuropil and around larger nerve cell bodies, which communicate with a well-developed closed venous system. These channels help in the circulation and nourishment of the nervous tissue in cephalopods.
